page.title: 10COURTFIELDS
page.content: Courtfields is an estate of private and council houses .It is situated on Buttsway hill on the outskirts of Milverton.The houses are in one circle with a big car park in the middle. There are 39 houses including two flats.Between two houses there is an entrance to the allotments which people rent either in place of a back garden or to grow garden produce.Also there are garages which are cheap to rent,there are 20 of them.They are at the top of the estate and have a path leading down to the circle of houses. The types of jobs in Courtfields are building,working in the local hospital and working in the allotments.The children either go to primary school or to Kingsmead Comprehensive.Many of the people have cars but some boys have motor cycles and the children have bicycles.
